data.title: Famous St Louis Blues Player Appearances & Events
data.meta_description: If your company desires famous St Louis Blues players for a corporate event, Sports Speakers 360 can help. Call now for details about player appearances and events!
data.text: The St. Louis Blues were founded in 1967 as an expansion team when the NHL expanded from six teams to twelve teams. The Blues play in the Central Division with the Chicago Blackhawks, Columbus Blue Jackets, Nashville Predators and Detroit Red Wings. Among their most famous players include Brian Sutter, Bernie Federko, Brett Hull, Al Macinnis and Chris Pronger.
